Question
========
What is the best description of a standard deviation (SD)?

Answerlist
----------
* The SD expresses what percentage of the units of analysis deviate from the mean deviate.
* The SD is the difference between the mean and the spread of a distribution.
* The SD is the mean deviation from the mean.
* The SD is the number of observations that comprise 68% of the distribution.
